poem:
### The Sound of Fear

In corridors of power,
Vance's voice
carries wind to ember,
the future
shrouded in mistrust. A starless
night where truth falters,
echoes of fear
reverberate—blind guides
whispering tales of shadows,
while the earth
awaits dawn's discerning light.
